Lagos State College of Health Technology, nke a na-akpọ LASCOHET, bụ otu n'ime kọleji kachasị ochie nke teknụzụ ahụike na Naịjirịa ma guzobe ya na afọ 1920.
Lagos State College of Health Technology, nke a maara dị ka School of Hygiene bụ nke Dr I

Oladipo Oluwole guzobere na afọ 1920 dabere na ọnọdụ ahụike dị na obere ihe onwunwe ahụike mmadụ dị na obodo ahụ.  Ụlọ akwụkwọ ịdị ọcha nke oge ahụ nyere isi ọmụmụ ahụike isii tupu itinye ọzụzụ nke ndị na-amụ nwa na ndị nọọsụ obodo n'ime mmemme ya n'etiti afọ 1957 na afọ 1966.

N'ụbọchị iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1977, a gbanwere Lagos State College of Health Technology, n'okpuru ntụziaka nke Gọmentị Ndị Agha Federal site na ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ịdị ọcha gaa na ụlọ akwụkwọ teknụzụ ahụike n'ihi atụmatụ mmepe nke mba nke atọ (1975), na National Basic Health Service Scheme (NBHSS) nke nyere iwu ka ndị ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè dị n'etiti maka ngalaba ahụike.

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2004, onye bụbu Gọvanọ nke Lagos State, Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu kwadoro nguzobe nke Lagos State College of Health Technology na kansụl na-achịkwa kọleji nke Lagos Steeti nke teknụzụ ka Babatunde Raji Fashola化s Administration guzobere ma meghee ya na Julaị, afọ 2012.
Onye isi oche, onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na ndị otu 2 nke ndị nkuzi nke kọleji na-eduzi kansụl na-achịkwa Lagos State College of Health Technology.
E kewara kọleji teknụzụ ahụike nke steeti Lagos n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ isii:

Kọleji ahụike nke teknụzụ nke steeti Lagos dị na Alagbomeji, Yaba, gburugburu ebe obibi nke nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gọmentị ndị ọzọ dị ka; Queen's College, Nigerian Institute of Medical Research, Yaba College of Technology, Igbobi College, Mahadum Lagos, Federal Science and Technical College, na Federal College of Education.
